text: A byte-addressable system with 16-bit addresses ships with a four-way set associative, write- back cache of size 8KB. The cache implements a true LRU replacement policy using the minimum number of replacement policy bits necessary to implement it. The tag store requires a total of 2304 bits of storage. Assume that 1 valid bit and 1 dirty bit maintains for each block. What is the block size of the cache? (a) 8 bytes (b) 16 bytes (c) 32 bytes (d) 64 bytes
